NL Question: Find the phone number associated with the person named 'Larry Reed'.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person {name: 'Larry Reed'})-[:HAS_PHONE]->(ph:Phone) RETURN ph.phoneNo AS phoneNumber
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!
